project.name: jose
project.description:
JSON Object Signing and Encryption (JOSE)
A clean-room implementation of the JSON Object Signing and Encryption (JOSE) specifications. Inlcudes RFC 7515 JSON Web Signature (JWS), RFC 7516 JSON Web Encryption (JWE), RFC 7517 JSON Web Key (JWK), RFC 7518 JSON Web Algorithm (JWA), RFC 7519 JSON Web Token (JWT), RFC 7797 JWS Unencoded payload ("JUP").
History:
v0.0.1 - new project
